translation.title: Ten Discourses On How Giving Helps to Become a Cool Cloud God

next.name: How Giving Helps to Become a Warm Cloud God, Etc.

segments.en: 3–12. Ten Discourses On How Giving Helps to Become a Cool Cloud God

segments.pli: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Seated to one side, that mendicant said to the Buddha:

segments.pli: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti?
segments.en: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of cool clouds?”

segments.pli: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṃ carati, vācāya sucaritaṃ carati, manasā sucaritaṃ carati.
segments.en: “Mendicant, it’s when someone does good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
‘The gods of cool clouds are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’

segments.pli: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti.
segments.en: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the cool clouds!’

segments.pli: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.
segments.en: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the gods of cool clouds.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti.
segments.en: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of cool clouds.”

suttaplex.blurb: Someone of good conduct and appropriate aspiration may be reborn as a cloud god in a cool cloud if they give various gifts.
